name: #OneRoom
description:
Welcome to #OneRoom! Make yourself at home and start decorating.

Play fun 2-tile-matching game to renovate and decorate your room, and even unlock new room to widen your space! It’s an easy relaxing game packed with beautiful design. Start your #OneRoom now!

Game Features
- Simple game play; just match 2 tiles at a right-angle.
- Furniture shopping: explore designers’ brands and themes, unlock over 80 pieces of furniture.
- Interior design: mix and match as you like! Your #OneRoom can be extraordinary.
- See others’ rooms. Hashtag #OneRoom
